name: Prospect Creek
description:
Introduction

Can be combined with Wightman Fork for a double-header day. In low flow, 1 mandatory rappel. There are a couple nice, short waterslides.

Approach

Descent

The canyon drops over 500 ft in about a half mile.

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Thanks to Doug Scott for putting this one on the radar. He marks 7 waterfalls on his "Enhanced USGS topo map" on his site http://www.dougscottart.com/hobbies/waterfalls/TreasureCr.htm.

First known descent 9/6/2016 by Wayne Herrick and Logan DeGrand. Of the 7 waterfalls, we rappelled 2 and down-climbed the others. In higher flow will be more required rappels.

Background
